As the world’s attention is focused on tackling #COVID19, how best can partnerships protect children and families from life-threatening diseases? GSK and @savechildrenuk global health experts’ discuss this here: https://t.co/0d5DdtzxnG #ProtectAGeneration #VaccinesWork
Our oncology scientists are working hard to discover treatments that could transform the future of cancer treatment for patients. Go #BehindTheScience to find out more about our work in oncology.

This Sunday is #worldlupusday. In these challenging times, we want to continue to raise awareness and support those living with #lupus. Do you know who lupus affects? Vote below and we’ll share the answer tomorrow!
#WorldOvarianCancerDay is Friday, 8 May. Find out how you can join us, and others across the globe, in using your #PowerfulVoice to help raise awareness about #ovariancancer. #WOCD2020
